text: John Richard Cluff (June 27, 1950 â€“ July 2, 2024) was a Canadian journalist. He hosted the CBC Radio Vancouver morning program The Early Edition from 1997 until 2018. He was a member of the Canadian Football Hall of Fame. He received the Lifetime Achievement Award from the Canadian Radio Television Digital News Association. He died of cancer on July 2, 2024, five days after his 74th birthday. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Writers from Toronto Category:Canadian journalists Category:People in the Canadian Football Hall of Fame
title: Rick Cluff
